description:
A change of fortune can only mean one thing: FOOD! Later, Yuko learns the hard way that she and Momo have vastly different definitions of “training.”
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Momoiro Method!! Marui Tire wa Unmei no Wa!!
The Pink Method!! The Wheel of Fate Is a Round Tire!!
桃色メソッド!! 丸いタイヤは運命の輪!!
복숭아 색 메소드!! 둥근 타이어는 운명의 바퀴!!
